page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: (AGRICULTURAL & INDUSTRIAL)Of those in employment,no more than 5% are in agriculture,this includes farmers and farm workers,whereas over 80% are in industry in and out of the block. B.N.F.L. employs almost half this figure;the rest commute to B.Ae.Warton and works in Preston,Blackpool and Kirkham.'Industrial' includes light and heavy engineering,clerical and general. (SELF EMPLOYED)About 6% of the working population are in this category,from small shopkeepers to farmers,market gardeners,insurance collectors,joiners and builders.There are several such small firms in the block. (UNEMPLOYMENT)This mainly affects those under 21,chiefly males.Of the under 21 population,nearly 10% are not in work; most are between 16 & 18.Unemployment benefits are payed by the D.H.S.S. at St.Annes.
